name: Highschool 101
description:
This is a game jam game made by team NoIdea for UE4 July Jam.
The theme was "Speak softly and carry a huge stick"

Game was created by

DennyRocket
Derzo
Jakayaki
Slapunas
VictorBurgos

Music

Fretless
The Show Must Be Go
Marty Got a Plan

Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
